LanguageData.OE_TorraxinHigh.label: torraxin boosted
LanguageData.OE_TorraxinHigh.description: Torraxin in the bloodstream. Boosts melee combat stats. Effect weakens over time.
LanguageData.OE_TorraxinHigh.stages.first_stage.label: first stage
LanguageData.OE_TorraxinHigh.stages.third_stage.label: third stage
LanguageData.OE_TorraxinAftereffect.label: torraxin after-effect
LanguageData.OE_TorraxinAddiction.label: torraxin addiction
LanguageData.OE_TorraxinAddiction.description: Because of an torraxin addiction, this person needs to regularly consume torraxin to avoid withdrawal symptoms.
